column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " It 's so good to see you ! "
#Text=Tenzin says : " How have you been , Korra ?
#Text=Come on , I want to show you how much better I 'm doing .
#Text=" Korra says : " Attack !
#Text=I can take it !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " All right !
#Text=The sparring match is over !
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought I was ready .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " There is no shame in taking the time you need to make a full recovery .
#Text=Being the Avatar can wait .
#Text=" Korra says : " But what about the Earth Kingdom ?
#Text=I hear it 's still a mess out there .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The situation has been stabilizing since Kuvira took charge .
#Text=" Korra says : " But that should be me out there fixing things , not her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know you want to help .
#Text=But trust me , everyone has this under control .
#Text=I just think you need to ... " Korra says : " If you say , " be patient " , I swear I 'm gon na water - smack you in the mouth !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Nooo ... I was going to say , you need to ... not worry about the future .
#Text=Be grateful for where you are now and the progress you 've made .
#Text="
